com.db.chart.model

Class BarSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.db.chart.model.ChartSet
      • com.db.chart.model.BarSet

  • public class BarSet
extends ChartSet
    Data model containing a set of Bar to be used by BaseBarChartView.

      • setColor

        public BarSet setColor(int color)
        Define the color of bars. Previously defined colors will be overridden.
        Parameters:
        color - Color to be assigned to every bar in this set.
        Returns:
        BarSet self-reference.

      • setGradientColor

        public BarSet setGradientColor(int[] colors,
                               float[] positions)
        Define a gradient color to the bars. Previously defined colors will be overridden.
        Parameters:
        colors - The colors to be distributed among gradient
        positions - Position/order from which the colors will be place
        Returns:
        BarSet self-reference.
